lyrics.kanji: ねえ いつになれば君に会えるの？
lyrics.romaji: Nee itsu ni nareba kimi ni aeru no?
lyrics.english: Hey, when will I be able to see you again?

lyrics.kanji: ねえ いつになれば世界は戻るの？
lyrics.romaji: Nee itsu ni nareba sekai wa modoru no?
lyrics.english: Hey, when will the world return to normal?

lyrics.kanji: あとどれくらい続いてくのだろう？
lyrics.romaji: Ato dore kurai tsuzuiteku no darou?
lyrics.english: I wonder how much longer this will continue

lyrics.kanji: とても暗い足元の日々よ
lyrics.romaji: Totemo kurai ashimoto no hibi yo
lyrics.english: Oh, these dark days beneath my feet

lyrics.kanji: ごめん 辛い 目に見えぬ恐怖に
lyrics.romaji: Gomen tsurai me ni mienu kyōfu ni
lyrics.english: Sorry, it’s painful — the invisible fear

lyrics.kanji: 心砕かれて諦めてしまいそう
lyrics.english: My heart feels shattered — I’m about to give up

lyrics.kanji: 手を取り合い もう一度
lyrics.english: Let’s hold hands once more

lyrics.kanji: 共に夜明けを迎えよう
lyrics.english: And greet the dawn together

lyrics.kanji: 終わりのない不安も 戻りはしない時間も
lyrics.romaji: Owari no nai fuan mo modori wa shinai jikan mo
lyrics.english: Even endless worries and time that won’t return

lyrics.kanji: 抱きしめて進むから
lyrics.english: We’ll embrace them and move forward

lyrics.kanji: 手を取り合い もう一度
lyrics.english: Let’s hold hands once more

lyrics.kanji: 共に願いを叶えよう
lyrics.english: Let’s make our wishes come true together

lyrics.kanji: 孤独に耐えた日々も 誰かのための一歩
lyrics.romaji: Kodoku ni taeta hibi mo dareka no tame no ippo
lyrics.english: Even the lonely days we endured were steps for someone else

lyrics.kanji: あの日の笑顔に会いに行こう
lyrics.romaji: Ano hi no egao ni ai ni ikou
lyrics.english: Let’s go meet those smiles from that day

lyrics.kanji: ねえ 知ってるよ 先が見えていないこと
lyrics.romaji: Nee shitteru yo saki ga mieteinai koto
lyrics.english: Hey, I know we can’t see what lies ahead

lyrics.kanji: ねえ 知ってるよ 元には戻らないこと
lyrics.romaji: Nee shitteru yo moto ni wa modoranai koto
lyrics.english: Hey, I know we can’t go back to how it was

lyrics.kanji: あとどれくらい続けられるだろう？
lyrics.english: I wonder how much longer we can keep going

lyrics.kanji: 声のない心の叫びを
lyrics.romaji: Koe no nai kokoro no sakebi o
lyrics.english: The voiceless cries of our hearts

lyrics.kanji: ごめん 辛いが 浮かばれないでしょ
lyrics.english: Sorry, it’s painful — it feels like we can’t rise above

lyrics.kanji: 諦めてしまえば そこで終わりなの
lyrics.english: If we give up, that’s where it ends

lyrics.kanji: 手を取り合い もう一度
lyrics.english: Let’s hold hands once more

lyrics.kanji: 共に願いを捧げよう
lyrics.english: Let’s offer up our wishes together

lyrics.kanji: 失われた命 この祈りよ 永遠に
lyrics.romaji: Ushinawareta inochi kono inori yo eien ni
lyrics.english: Lost lives, may these prayers last forever

lyrics.kanji: 忘れずに刻むから
lyrics.english: We’ll engrave them in our hearts forever

lyrics.kanji: 手を取り合い もう一度
lyrics.english: Let’s hold hands once more

lyrics.kanji: 僕は誓いを歌うよ
lyrics.romaji: Boku wa chikai o utau yo
lyrics.english: I’ll sing my vow

lyrics.kanji: 次の世代の誰か 僕らの子供たちが
lyrics.romaji: Tsugi no sedai no dareka bokura no kodomotachi ga
lyrics.english: So that someone of the next generation — our children —

lyrics.kanji: 迷わず歩いて行けるように
lyrics.english: Can walk forward without hesitation

lyrics.kanji: 手を取り合いを もう一度
lyrics.english: Let’s hold hands once more

lyrics.kanji: 枯れた世界を繋げよう
lyrics.english: Let’s connect this withered world again

lyrics.kanji: 壊れないように 無くさないように
lyrics.english: So it won’t break, so it won’t be lost

lyrics.kanji: 抱きしめて進むから
lyrics.english: We’ll hold on tight and move forward

lyrics.kanji: 手を取り合い もう一度
lyrics.english: Let’s hold hands once more

lyrics.kanji: 僕ら何度も歌うよ
lyrics.romaji: Bokura nan do mo utau yo
lyrics.english: We’ll sing it over and over again

lyrics.kanji: 世界中のどこか 歌を聴いた君が
lyrics.romaji: Sekaijū no doko ka uta o kiita kimi ga
lyrics.english: Somewhere in the world, when you hear this song

lyrics.kanji: 笑ってくれるように もう一度 もう一度
lyrics.english: May you smile again, once more, once more

lyrics.kanji: 手を取り合いを もう一度
lyrics.english: Let’s hold hands once more

lyrics.kanji: 共に夜明けを迎えよう
lyrics.english: Let’s greet the dawn together

lyrics.kanji: 終わりのない不安も 戻りはしない時間も
lyrics.romaji: Owari no nai fuan mo modori wa shinai jikan mo
lyrics.english: Even endless fears and lost time

lyrics.kanji: 抱きしめて進むから
lyrics.english: We’ll embrace them and move forward

lyrics.kanji: 手を取り合いを もう一度
lyrics.english: Let’s hold hands once more

lyrics.kanji: 共に願いを叶えよう
lyrics.english: Let’s make our wishes come true together

lyrics.kanji: 孤独に耐えた日々も 誰かのための一歩
lyrics.romaji: Kodoku ni taeta hibi mo dareka no tame no ippo
lyrics.english: Even the lonely days we endured were steps for someone else

lyrics.kanji: 僕らの明日を迎えに行こう
lyrics.romaji: Bokura no ashita o mukae ni ikou
lyrics.english: Let’s go and greet our tomorrow
